attributes.action: exempt people from early repayment charges for mortgage payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear PM,
Considering the liquidity issues which are affecting majority of the Banks I would like to put forward my views regarding early repayment charges which the banks r charging for people who want to return their principal amount in case of fixed term mortgage home loans. I would request u to please ask all the banks to waive the early repayment charges for the next 2 years on all fixed term home loan customers as there are many people who have cash with them but r not able to invest in any where safe due the current volatile markets.
I think this would be a very good step in helping out the liquidity issues with the banks and make more money avaliable to them.
